description:
`run-js`_ is a new Python package that enables users to easily run
JavaScript modules in Python without breaking from the familiar Pythonic
syntax. With inspiration from `sh`_, it wraps the module instance
intercepting requests. This talk will go over cool examples on how to
use run-js and also dive into its internals, explain sys.modules, dunder
methods, and how to pipe data between JS and Python processes.

.. _run-js: https://github.com/danieljdufour/run-js
.. _sh: https://github.com/amoffat/sh
title: Run-JS: A New Library for Running JavaScript Modules in Python
